definition: Lushan county in Ya'an 雅安[Ya3 an1], Sichuan
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: Epidemic prevention work is also underway in the earthquake affected area of Lushan County.
sentences.chinese: 地震災區蘆山縣正在進行傳染病防治工作。

sentences.english: Houses in Lushan were severely damaged, and resident emplacements were pretty large.
sentences.chinese: 蘆山縣城房屋受損嚴重，居民安置量很大。
